item.title: Oxford IPS120 v1.3.0.15
item.description:
Product: Oxford IPS120 v1.3.0.15
Company: Oxford
Release Date: Wed, 08 Jan 2020 15:29:11 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Application and drivers for Oxford IPS 120-10 superconducting magnet power supply that is used on the DR200 dilution refrigerator.

Release Notes: [1.3.0.15]
- update IPS120.lvclass to inherit from Instrument.Cryostat.lvclass
- override Get and Set Magnet Field methods defined by parent class
- automate exe and installer build
- update application icon
item.dc:creator: Oxford

item.title: PPMS Monitor and Control v1.4.9.33
item.description:
Product: PPMS Monitor and Control v1.4.9.33
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Wed, 08 Jan 2020 13:07:54 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Program for logging PPMS status to the DSC. Provides a UI and API for controlling the magnet field, temperature, and rotator angle (for PPM2)

Release Notes: [1.4.9.33]
- build w/ Instrument.lvclass v1.4.1.51
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Instruments v1.4.1.52
item.description:
Product: Instruments v1.4.1.52
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Tue, 07 Jan 2020 12:38:02 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Abstract instrument.lvclass

Release Notes: [1.4.1.52]
- Modify Set Strain and Set Delay to have rate parameter
- Update Palettes
item.dc:creator: Levylab

item.title: Instruments v1.4.0.51
item.description:
Product: Instruments v1.4.0.51
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Mon, 06 Jan 2020 17:43:24 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Abstract instrument.lvclass

Release Notes: [1.4.0.51]
This release defines several new instrument types and new abstract API methods:

Capacitance Bridge:
- Get Capacitance
- Set Capacitance

Strain Cell:
- Get Strain
- Set Strain

Optical Delay Line:
- Get Delay
- Set Delay
item.dc:creator: Levylab

Description: Abstract instrument.lvclass

Release Notes: [1.4.0.50]
This release defines several new instrument types and new abstract API methods:

Capacitance Bridge:

- Set Capacitance

Strain Cell:
- Get Strain
- Set Strain

Optical Delay Line:
- Get Delay
- Set Delay
item.dc:creator: Levylab

item.title: Cryostation v1.1.0.6
item.description:
Product: Cryostation v1.1.0.6
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Mon, 06 Jan 2020 16:45:11 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Program for logging Montana Instruments Cryostation status to the DSC. Provides a UI and API for getting information from the Cryostation.

Release Notes: [1.1.0.6]
- now monitoring all temperature stages and chamber pressure
- build w/ Instrument.lvclass v1.3.2.49
item.dc:creator: LevyLab
